src_original: na hi vivekāccalanti sarvadharmāḥ kenāpi stambhitāḥ /  kiṃ tarhi? prakṛtyaiva viveke sthirāstataḥ prajñāpāramitāpi sthirā /
prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādatā /  kutaḥ? sarvadharmānutpādatayā /  tathāhi niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ /  tasmānnotpadyante kharaviṣāṇavat /  tasmādanutpādāḥ /
tadvatprajñāpāramitāpi /  anirodhā prajñāpāramitā /  kutaḥ? sarvadharmāṇāmanirodhatayā /  na hyamī nirudhyante 'sattvāt kharaviṣāṇavat /
tadvatprajñāpāramitāpi /  prajñāpāramitāyā aparyantatā /  kenopamānena?  gaganāparyantatayā /  tathāhi gaganasya nāsti paryanto daśasu dikṣu triṣu cādhveṣu /
